about_the_game:
About the Game

EndlessChoice is a card-building game that offers both solo and multiplayer cooperation. Join the discord to find teammates and provide feedback.

People from different worlds and eras are trapped in this crisis-ridden world. They form adventure teams, pick up weapons, and continuously explore the outside, unraveling the layers of mysteries in this world.

Game Features

What sets us apart from traditional card-building games is that both players and monsters have their own positions in our game. Cards also need to be played within the attack range, requiring players to move to avoid monster attacks. Forced displacement can be used to protect teammates, and many cards are designed for interesting variations in the game.

Players use dice to activate cards in the game, and each profession's different dice points will bring different additional effects. There are also rich relic card combinations to bring a whole new experience.


Obtaining high-quality cards is no longer limited to drawing and upgrading. In the game, players can fuse two cards to obtain a new high-quality card, meaning that basic cards no longer need to be discarded.

The game supports up to 3 players cooperating in challenges. Quickly invite your teammates to start this adventure full of unknowns.

short_description: EndlessChoice is a deck-building game that uses dice and cards. players can choose different professions, weapons, and cards, along with various unique items to build their own deck. Players can also invite friends to cooperate in defeating enemies, with a maximum of three people playing together.
